title: braised breast of lamb with artichoke purée and purple sprouting broccoli
ingredients: 1.25kg/2½lb breast of lamb, taken off the bone, rolled and tied (you can ask your butcher to do this for you)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1.25 litres/2½ pints chicken stock, or vegetable stock, warmed
450g/1lb Jerusalem artichokes, peeled and cut into chunks
300g/10½oz purple sprouting broccoli, boiled until just tender
